groupChildren.uiToolTip: $$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/GeometryType/tooltip=Adjust how precise collisions should be (Fast has better performance, Contour has better edge detection)
$$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/density/tooltip=Density of layers that collide with each other. Higher numbers are heavier.
$$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/friction/tooltip=Adjust how much colliding layers decelerate when sliding against each other
$$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/restitution/tooltip=Adjust how much colliding layers bounce
$$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/wallCollide/tooltip=Make colliding layers bounce when hitting scene bounds
$$$/animal/Behavior/Box2d/Body/Parameter/motorStrength/tooltip=Adjust how quickly dynamic layers return to their original position (0 = do not return)

aProjectBehaviorParams.uiToolTip: $$$/animal/Behavior/RigDynamics/Parameter/collisionGroup/tooltip=Settings specific to Collide- and Dynamic-tagged layers
$$$/animal/Behavior/FaceTracker/param/cameraInput/tooltip=Analyzed face data from the camera; pause the face pose by holding down semicolon (;)
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/poseFilteringLevel/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize pausing the face or head at key poses; adjust Smoothing to ease the transition between poses
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/minPoseDuration/tooltip=Limits how quickly key poses can happen when Pose-to-Pose Movement is enabled
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/smoothingRate/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize the smoothness when transitioning between different face or head poses
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/headPosFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how much the head moves when you move your head
Exaggerate or minimize how much the head moves vertically when you move your head (vertical-only multiplier of Head Position Strength)
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/headScaleFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how much the head scales when you move your head closer or farther from the camera
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/headRotFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how much the head rotates when you tilt the top of your head to the right and left
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/eyebrowFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how much the eyebrows move when you raise and lower your eyebrows
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/eyeFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how far the eyelids move (if present) or the eyes scale (if not) when you blink
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/mouthFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how much the mouth scales and moves to correspond with your mouth movements
$$$/animal/behavior/face/param/parallaxFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize the eyes and nose movement when you rotate your head left and right
$$$/animal/Behavior/FaceTracker/Parameter/upEyebrowsTilt/tooltip=Amount of eyebrow tilt at their highest position
$$$/animal/Behavior/FaceTracker/Parameter/downEyebrowsTilt/tooltip=Amount of eyebrow tilt at their lowest position

groupChildren.uiToolTip: Sets the vertical range of the Left Eyelid; if missing, Left Eyelid Top _handle_ is used instead
Sets the vertical range of the Right Eyelid; if missing, Right Eyelid Top _handle_ is used instead
Sets the vertical range of the Left Eyelid; if missing, Left Eyelid Bottom _handle_ is used instead
Sets the vertical range of the Right Eyelid; if missing, Right Eyelid Bottom _handle_ is used instead
Enable pose-to-pose filter with advanced parameters
Number of samples (at scene frame rate) in pose-to-pose filter

Maximum interval in seconds between pose switches
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for mean head rotation values
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for variance of head rotation values
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for mean of head position values
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for variance of head position values
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for mean of eyebrow position values
Threshold to trigger pose transitions for variance of eyebrow position values

aProjectBehaviorParams.uiToolTip: $$$/private/ch/Behavior/Transform/Parameter/AdvancedGroup/tooltip=Parameters for finer control of the animation
$$$/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/param/cameraInput/tooltip=Control eye gaze direction via your webcam; pause the eye gaze by holding down semicolon (;)
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/mouseEyeGaze/tooltip=Control eye gaze direction with mouse; pause the eye gaze by holding down semicolon (;)
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/keyboardEyeGaze/tooltip=Control eye gaze direction with the Arrow keys; pause the eye gaze by holding down semicolon (;)
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/smoothingRate/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize the smoothness when transitioning between different pupil positions
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/eyeGazeFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how far the pupils move when you look around
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/mouseEyeGazeFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how far the pupils move when you drag using the mouse or touch screen
$$$/animal/behavior/EyeGaze/param/keyboardEyeGazeFactor/tooltip=Exaggerate or minimize how far the pupils move when you use the Arrow keys
$$$/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/snapEyeGaze/tooltip=Snap eye gaze to predefined directions controlled by camera or mouse

aProjectBehaviorParams.disableWhen: (mouseEyeGaze.isDisarmed and keyboardEyeGaze.isDisarmed and cameraInput.isDisarmed) or snapEyeGaze.value == false
aProjectBehaviorParams.uiToolTip: $$$/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/minGazeDuration/tooltip=Limits how quickly eye gaze snapping happens
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/numEyeDartDirections/tooltip=Set number of eye dart directions to snap to
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/minSnapOffsetDist/tooltip=Set minimum offset distance from center to trigger snapping
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/leftRightScaleFactor/tooltip=Scale sensitivity of left-right eye gaze offset (lower means more likely to choose left-right directions)
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/upDownScaleFactor/tooltip=Scale sensitivity of up-down eye gaze offset (lower means more likely to choose up-down directions)
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/offAxisScaleFactor/tooltip=Scale sensitivity of off-axis eye gaze offset (lower means more likely to choose off-axis directions)
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/rectangularEyes/tooltip=Treat eyes as rectangular to set eye gaze boundaries
$$$/private/animal/Behavior/EyeGaze/Parameter/scaleTransforms/tooltip=Scale transforms to offset layer scaling from Build Panel

groupChildren.uiToolTip: $$$/animal/behavior/face/tag/LeftPupilRange/tooltip=Sets the movement range of the Left Pupil
$$$/animal/behavior/face/tag/RightPupilRange/tooltip=Sets the movement range of the Right Pupil
$$$/animal/behavior/face/tag/LeftPupilSize/tooltip=Sets the dimensions of the Left Pupil
$$$/animal/behavior/face/tag/RightPupilSize/tooltip=Sets the dimensions of the Right Pupil
